column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Janelle - Thanks for your great review. You are correct in your assessment of wait times during peak and off-peak hours. We do our best to keep the machine cogs turning in our restaurant
column2: but there are limitations to how quickly we can prepare food
column4: we advise accuracy over speed at all costs. But I'm glad you enjoyed our fare
column5: and we appreciate your very kind words. We hope to serve you again the near future!
